'''Eliminating the Hidden Danger''' is a [[Random Event]] that can occur while exploring the world.

==Steps==
#Dismantle the training equipment.

==Dialogue==
{{Dialogue start}}
;(Upon entering the quest area)
:'''Paimon:''' This stuff looks like hilichurl training equipment to Paimon.
:'''Paimon:''' I reckon this is probably where those mega-strong hilichurls train.
:'''Paimon:''' Trashing their equipment should definitely set them back a bit.
{{Dialogue end}}
